description.lang: The In-Wall Dimmer Module is a Z-Wave enabled device which is fully compatible with any Z-Wave enabled network.Z-Wave enabled devices displaying the Z-Wave logo can also be used with it regardless of the manufacturer, and ours can also be used in other manufacturers Z-Wave enabled networks.Inclusion of this unit on other manufacturers Wireless Controller menu allows remote operation of the unit and the connected load.Z-Wave node in the system also acts as a repeater, so as to re-transmit the RF signal to ensure that the signal is received by its intended destination by routing the signal around obstacles and radio dead spots.The In-Wall Dimmer Module is designed to control the on/off status of lighting and appliances load in your house.The unit also provides dimmer function which is only applicable to light bulbs.AC 230V voltage, this module can support up to 300W resistive/ incandescent load, or 200W fluorescent load.
